mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.industry_type_code AS "industryTypeCode", a.credit_code AS "creditCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.post_code AS "postCode", a.address AS "address", a.legal_person_name AS "legalPersonName", a.legal_person_duty AS "legalPersonDuty", a.legal_person_tel AS "legalPersonTel", a.principal_person_name AS "principalPersonName", a.principal_person_duty AS "principalPersonDuty", a.principal_person_tel AS "principalPersonTel", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", area.id as "area.id", area.code as "area.code", area.name as "area.name"
left join sys_area area on area.code=area_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_ent( id, name, industry_type_code, credit_code, area_code, post_code, address, legal_person_name, legal_person_duty, legal_person_tel, principal_person_name, principal_person_duty, principal_person_tel, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{industryTypeCode}, #{creditCode}, #{areaCode}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{legalPersonName}, #{legalPersonDuty}, #{legalPersonTel}, #{principalPersonName}, #{principalPersonDuty}, #{principalPersonTel}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bas_ent SET name = #{name}, industry_type_code = #{industryTypeCode}, credit_code = #{creditCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, post_code = #{postCode}, address = #{address}, legal_person_name = #{legalPersonName}, legal_person_duty = #{legalPersonDuty}, legal_person_tel = #{legalPersonTel}, principal_person_name = #{principalPersonName}, principal_person_duty = #{principalPersonDuty}, principal_person_tel = #{principalPersonTel}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
